books.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
books.image_style: modern inspirational finance illustration, cinematic lighting

chapters.title: Introduction
chapters.text: The book introduces two father figures with very different approaches to money, work, and life. One believes in job security and education, while the other focuses on financial independence.

chapters.title: Money Mindset
chapters.text: The rich do not work for money. Instead, they focus on making money work for them through investments and businesses.

chapters.title: Assets vs Liabilities
chapters.text: Assets put money in your pocket while liabilities take money out. Understanding this difference is the foundation of wealth building.

chapters.title: Financial Education
chapters.text: Schools fail to teach financial intelligence. Learning about cash flow, investing, and entrepreneurship is essential.

chapters.title: Conclusion
chapters.text: Financial freedom comes from knowledge, discipline, and long-term thinking rather than job security.
